text: niccayamaka, nam musavai nam'mutaiya attatcikalai kontu anuppivaittu, "nir um'mutaiya camukattinarai irulkaliliruntu, veliyerrip pirakacattin pal kontu varum, allahvin arutkotaikalai avarkalukku ninaivuttuviraka" enru kattalaiyittom; niccamayaka itil porumaiyutaiyor, nanri celuttuvor ellorukkum patippinaikal irukkinrana
